summary: Love grows where it isn't expected in this endearing romantic comedy coming of age movie.
cast: Vivian Sung|Talu Wang|Dino Lee|Dewi Chien|Berry Wen-i Kuo|Yi-Chen Tsai|Alina Cheng|Ian Chen|He-Hsuan Lin|Li-Tung Chang|Kristy Cha Ray Chu|Hsin-Ling Chung|Chieh-Hui Hsu|Wei-hsun Na|Chung-Heng Chu|Shiau-Shiang Lee|Andy Lau|Joe Chen|Jerry Yan|Chen-Hsin An|Chi-Chun Chang|Chung-Jui Chang|Fan-Chun Chang|Hunt Chang|Yen-Kuei Chen|Yi-Heng Chen|Chen-Jun Cheng|Kuan-Yu Chi|Chih-Heng Chiu|Feng-Sen Chiu|Ping-Yu Chiu|Chih-Chung Chuan|Po-Lin Chuang|Ko-Wei Chueh|Sheng-Yuan Fan|Kei Gambit|Holly Ho|Keelong Hsu|Cheng-Hsiang Kang|Chun-An Kao|Chien-Wei Lan|Rick Lee|Yo Lee|Kuang-Yu Li|Kuo-Chung Li|Bruce Lin|Sean Lin|Victoria Lin|Kuan-Lin Lu|Chih-Yung Nieh|Chia-Chia Peng|Hsin-Yi Shen|Chih-Tian Shih|Wei-Chen Sun|Mei-Ching Ting|Yu-Ting Tseng|Yu-Cheng Wang|Yi-Ting Wu|Chuan-Shin Yang|Jia-Chen Yin|Ping-Hsin Yu|Gino Zhuang
director: Director: Yu Shan Chen (as Frankie Chen)
title: Our Times
